response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me and I believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs, given its worth of $1,500,000 to you. My proposal is to offer this product to you at a price that reflects its true value and ensures a fair transaction for both parties. I kindly invite you to consider my offer at $1,350,000.

Please let me know if you require any further information or if there's anything else I can assist you with regarding this remarkable product. I am confident that we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
